    Experiences Out of the Body

    Introduction →

    Out of the Body Experiences

    Exhibition based on the experiences lived through different Out of the Body Experiences.

    10 Visionary Media Artworks

    9 different interpretations in form of artwork surrounding a main central cylindrical message-piece.

    Media Art on the Blockchain

    Artwork is digitally encrypted and can be purchased and printed over the EOS Blockchain.
